turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order for a drink a Starbucks for pick up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. what type of drink would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a tall iced skinny mocha with whipped cream and soy milk and two pumps of caramel, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. No, I think that's going to be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm your order. you want a tall iced skinny mocha with whipped cream and soy milk, and two pumps of caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. would you like to place your order for now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up shortly at the starbucks on California street. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Thank you so much. Bye.
